snippet: Charlotte Brown, a legally blind 15-year-old pole-vaulter, cleared three heights at the Texas state championships in Austin but did not win a medal.
abstract: Charlotte Brown, legally blind 15-year-old pole-vaulter, clears three heights at the Texas state championships in Austin but does not win a medal.
lead_paragraph: Charlotte Brown, a legally blind 15-year-old pole-vaulter, cleared three heights at the Texas state championships in Austin but did not win a medal.

headline.main: Partly Blind Pole-Vaulter Misses a Medal
headline.print_headline: Partly Blind Pole-Vaulter Misses a Medal
